queries.query:
from(bucket: "e2")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "IntData")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["switch_id"] == "1" or r["switch_id"] == "3" or r["switch_id"] == "5")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["port"] == "p2")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["queue"] == "q0")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "depth")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1s, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "e2")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "IntData")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["switch_id"] == "1" or r["switch_id"] == "3" or r["switch_id"] == "5")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["port"] == "p1")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["queue"] == "q0")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "depth")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1s, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "e2")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "IntData")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["switch_id"] == "1" or r["switch_id"] == "3" or r["switch_id"] == "5")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["port"] == "p2")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["queue"] == "q1")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "depth")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1s, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "e2")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "IntData")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["switch_id"] == "1" or r["switch_id"] == "3" or r["switch_id"] == "5")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["port"] == "p1")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["queue"] == "q1")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "depth")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1s, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")
